title: Arlington House, The Robert  E. Lee Memorial: Photos & Multimedia
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Photos & Multimedia             Photos & Multimedia              Arlington House Kitchen Garden   Loading the player...       Visit JWPlayer docs for keyboard shortcuts  Duration:1 minute, 22 seconds  A peek into the Kitchen Garden.              View more Arlington House photos on our Flickr site.            Please visit our Instagram page! If you have an Instagram of your own, follow us!                                Scientific Analysis of Historic Bricks to Shed Light on History at Arlington House To help inform the strategy and techniques that will be used to restore Arlington House, the National Park Service is learning more about the people who built the home between 1802 and 1818, and bricks used in the home's original construction.  Duration:36 seconds
